"Wake Me Up When September Ends" by Green Day - This song represents the end of a long, difficult period in my life. It's a reminder that even in the darkest times, there's always hope for a brighter future.

"Viva la Vida" by Coldplay - This song captures the essence of my life's journey, with its themes of power, corruption, and the fleeting nature of human existence. It's a reflection of my own experiences and the lessons I've learned along the way.
"Roar" by Katy Perry - This empowering anthem represents my growth and self-discovery. It's a reminder that I have the power to overcome any obstacle and rise above adversity.

"Skinny Love" by Bon Iver - This hauntingly beautiful song represents the fragility and vulnerability of human relationships. It's a reminder that even in the midst of chaos, there's always beauty to be found.

"Uptown Funk" by Mark Ronson ft. Bruno Mars - This funky, upbeat track represents the joy and freedom that comes with embracing my true self. It's a celebration of individuality and the power of self-expression.
